attributes.additional_details:
.sir i already brought into you kind notice that some anti social elements wants to disturb the prevailing atmosphere of peace,justice and good governance also security environment in the Great Britain...so i meekly once again requesting that following steps should be taken in the wide interest of the people of UK........
(1)             all the donation collection from fundamentalists must be stopped..
(2)              they should not allowed to distribute some booklets or pamphlet or other written material which can cause the sectarianism.
(3)              to ban the Pakistani politics here in UK at all levels,like PMLN,PPP.MQM etc.............why they wants that dirty politics here???such elements must be removed from  UK....because by this exercise they often quarrel and create law and order situation?
